thread.title: Best stay at a hotel ever
thread.title_full: Best stay at a hotel ever - Review of The Pierre, A Taj Hotel, New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ellen W
title: Best stay at a hotel ever
text: My husband and I just returned from a most enjoyable stay at the Pierre Hotel in New York City. From the moment we enter the hotel to the time we stepped into the cab to the airport our service was perfection. Across the board, from door men, to wait staff, housekeeping to concierge assistance we couldn't be happier.
